IColonyEvent is named a bit weirdly, especially since you force it to have a spawnpoint.
Maybe think of something that more allines with your goals.
Something like IColonyEntitySpawnEvent or IColonyGroupSpawnEvent possibly with some abstraction into an IColonySpawnEvent and IColonyEvent

Also you might want to have an interface that describes an event that spawns a structure.
So that raid events are both spawning and have structure handling.
This makes expanding this system easier in the future -> Think of camps of traiders that spawn outside the city walls to trade with etc.
ye you're right indeed, colony event doesnt necessarily need entities, splitting it makes sense. An interface for spawning structures alongside an event should be useful too
I've seperated them into Colony/Spawn/entitySpawn/raid/structureSpawn types now, think that should fit it
